verses.verse: For this cause <S%G5484><s%> <S%G5127><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%>

If <S%G1489><s%> ye have heard <S%G191><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> you-ward: <S%G5209><s%>

How that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> he made known <S%G1107><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery; <S%G3466><s%> (as <S%G2531><s%> I wrote afore <S%G4270><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> few words, <S%G3641><s%>

Whereby, <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3739><s%> when ye read, <S%G314><s%> ye may <S%G1410><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> knowledge <S%G4907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ) <S%G5547><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> ages <S%G1074><s%> was not <S%G3756><s%> made known <S%G1107><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it is now <S%G3568><s%> revealed <S%G601><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

That the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> should be <S%G1511><s%> fellow heirs, <S%G4789><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the same body, <S%G4954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> partakers <S%G4830><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister, <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> gift <S%G1431><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> effectual working <S%G1753><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

Unto me, <S%G1698><s%> who am less than the least <S%G1647><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> given, <S%G1325><s%> that I should preach <S%G2097><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> unsearchable <S%G421><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to make all men see <S%G5461><s%> <S%G3956><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> mystery, <S%G3466><s%> which from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beginning of the world <S%G165><s%> hath been hid <S%G613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who created <S%G2936><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To the intent that <S%G2443><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> principalities <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places might be known <S%G1107><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> manifold <S%G4182><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> eternal <S%G165><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he purposed <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> of him. <S%G846><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I desire <S%G154><s%> that ye faint <S%G1573><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> tribulations <S%G2347><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

For this cause <S%G5484><s%> <S%G5127><s%> I bow <S%G2578><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> knees <S%G1119><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
Of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> family <S%G3965><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> is named, <S%G3687><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> he would grant <S%G1325><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> to be strengthened <S%G2901><s%> with might <S%G1411><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G848><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> inner <S%G2080><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

That Christ <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye, being rooted <S%G4492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love, <S%G26><s%>

May be able <S%G1840><s%> to comprehend <S%G2638><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints <S%G40><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> breadth, <S%G4114><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> length, <S%G3372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> depth, <S%G899><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> height; <S%G5311><s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G26><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which passeth <S%G5235><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might be filled <S%G4137><s%> with <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> exceeding abundantly <S%G5228><s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> think, <S%G3539><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> that worketh <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%>

Unto him <S%G846><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> ages, <S%G1074><s%> world without end. <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
